891220.name: pla_toon
891220.description:
pla_toon is an action-packed, first-and-third-person, multiplayer, light-hearted, shooter where you player a cartoon-style soldier.
Join the multiplayer battle and be the first to a para-crate drop to equip your player with powerful weapons! Or get on an ostrich and ride off into the sunset...

Features Include:

GameModes:
- DeathMatch
- Team Deathmatch
- Capture The Flag
- Co-op Base Defense vs. Bots

Levels:
- Desert Town
- Canyon Tower

Vehicles:
- Biplanes
- Jeep
- Rideable Ostriches

Weapons:
- M4 (Machine gun)
- AK (Machine gun)
- Sniper
- Bazooka
- Grenades

Other:
- Airplanes drop para-crates with powerful items in them throughout the rounds for the first player that reaches them.
- Players weapons can be shot out of their hands.
- Players belt grenades can be shot, making them explode instantly!
- Smooth but responsive physics based movement.
- Dynamic environment (Damage and destroy buildings, vehicles, and more)/
- Shooting a player with a bazooka at close range carries them away with the rocket, smashing though any walls in it's path.
- First-Person & Third-Person.
- "Cook" grenades.
- Single-player (play the GameModes against/with bots).
- Online-Multiplayer (Host and join your friends servers online).
- Optional blood hit effects.
- I'd like to get the game working on Mac as well
891220.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 匈牙利语, 韩语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 简体中文, 瑞典语, 繁体中文, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语
